trans-unit.source: Unknown option `{0}`. Please check `$(AndroidAapt2CompileExtraArgs)` and `$(AndroidAapt2LinkExtraArgs)` to see if they include any `aapt` command line arguments that are no longer valid for `aapt2` and ensure that all other arguments are valid for `aapt2`.
trans-unit.target: Nieznana opcja „{0}”. Sprawdź zmienne „$(AndroidAapt2CompileExtraArgs)” i „$(AndroidAapt2LinkExtraArgs)” pod kątem tego, czy zawierają jakiekolwiek argumenty wiersza polecenia „aapt”, które nie są już prawidłowe dla elementu „aapt2”, oraz upewnij się, że wszystkie pozostałe argumenty są prawidłowe dla elementu „aapt2”.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `aapt`, `aapt2`, `$(AndroidAapt2CompileExtraArgs)`, `$(AndroidAapt2LinkExtraArgs)` {0} - The invalid option name

trans-unit.source: Invalid file name: It must contain only {0}.
trans-unit.target: Nieprawidłowa nazwa pliku: może ona zawierać tylko: {0}.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The regular expression that the file name must match

trans-unit.source: Invalid file name: It must contain only {0}.
trans-unit.target: Nieprawidłowa nazwa pliku: może ona zawierać tylko: {0}.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The regular expression that the file name must match

trans-unit.source: Could not determine API level for $(TargetFrameworkVersion) of '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: Nie można określić poziomu interfejsu API dla parametru $(TargetFrameworkVersion) elementu „{0}”.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: $(TargetFrameworkVersion) {0} - The current value of $(TargetFrameworkVersion)

trans-unit.source: Could not determine $(AndroidApiLevel) or $(TargetFrameworkVersion); should not be reached.
trans-unit.target: Nie można określić parametru $(AndroidApiLevel) lub $(TargetFrameworkVersion); ten komunikat nie powinien być wyświetlany.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: $(AndroidApiLevel), $(TargetFrameworkVersion) In this message, the phrase "should not be reached" means that this error message is not expected to appear in normal usage.

trans-unit.source: Unhandled exception: {0}
trans-unit.target: Nieobsłużony wyjątek: {0}
trans-unit.note: {0} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: Could not determine $(TargetFrameworkVersion) for API level '{0}.'
trans-unit.target: Nie można określić parametru $(TargetFrameworkVersion) dla poziomu „{0}” interfejsu API.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: $(TargetFrameworkVersion) {0} - The API level number

trans-unit.source: Unsupported or invalid $(TargetFrameworkVersion) value of '{0}'. Please update your Project Options.
trans-unit.target: Nieobsługiwana lub nieprawidłowa wartość parametru $(TargetFrameworkVersion) dla elementu „{0}”. Zaktualizuj opcje projektu.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: $(TargetFrameworkVersion)

trans-unit.source: Could not find mono.android.jar
trans-unit.target: Nie można było znaleźć pliku mono.android.jar
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: mono.android.jar

trans-unit.source: Invalid `android:versionCode` value `{0}` in `AndroidManifest.xml`. It must be an integer value.
trans-unit.target: Nieprawidłowa wartość „android:versionCode” „{0}” w pliku „AndroidManifest.xml”. Musi to być wartość całkowita.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `android:versionCode`, `AndroidManifest.xml`

trans-unit.source: Invalid `android:versionCode` value `{0}` in `AndroidManifest.xml`. The value must be in the range of 0 to {1}.
trans-unit.target: Nieprawidłowa wartość „android:versionCode” „{0}” w pliku „AndroidManifest.xml”. Wartość musi mieścić się w zakresie od 0 do {1}.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `android:versionCode`, `AndroidManifest.xml` {0} - The current value {1} - The maximum allowed value

trans-unit.source: Building with JDK version `{0}` is not supported. Please install JDK version `{1}`. See https://aka.ms/xamarin/jdk9-errors
trans-unit.target: Kompilowanie przy użyciu wersji zestawu JDK „{0}” nie jest obsługiwane. Zainstaluj zestaw JDK w wersji „{1}”. Zobacz https://aka.ms/xamarin/jdk9-errors
trans-unit.note: The abbreviation "JDK" should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Java SDK {0} or above is required when using {1}.
trans-unit.target: W przypadku używania funkcji {1} jest wymagany zestaw Java SDK {0} lub nowszy.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The Java SDK version number {1} - The feature being used: `$(TargetFrameworkVersion) v10.0` or `<Project Sdk="Xamarin.Android.Sdk">`

trans-unit.source: Java SDK {0} or above is required when using Android SDK Build-Tools {1}.
trans-unit.target: W przypadku używania narzędzi Android SDK Build-Tools {1} jest wymagany zestaw Java SDK {0} lub nowszy.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Android SDK Build-Tools {0} - The Java SDK version number {1} - The Android SDK Build-Tools version number

trans-unit.source: Failed to get the Java SDK version because the returned value does not appear to contain a valid version number. `{0} -version` returned: ```{1}```
trans-unit.target: Nie udało się pobrać wersji zestawu Java SDK, ponieważ wygląda na to, że zwrócona wartość nie zawiera prawidłowego numeru wersji. Dane wyjściowe polecenia „{0} -version”: „{1}”
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `{0} -version`, ```{1}``` {0} - The name of the Java command {1} - The output of the command

trans-unit.source: Failed to get the Java SDK version. Please ensure you have Java {0} or above installed.
trans-unit.target: Nie udało się pobrać wersji zestawu Java SDK. Upewnij się, że masz zainstalowany język Java {0} lub nowszy.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The Java version number

trans-unit.source: EmbeddedNativeLibrary '{0}' is invalid in Android Application projects. Please use AndroidNativeLibrary instead.
trans-unit.target: Biblioteka EmbeddedNativeLibrary „{0}” jest nieprawidłowa w projektach aplikacji systemu Android. Zamiast niej należy użyć biblioteki AndroidNativeLibrary.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: EmbeddedNativeLibrary, AndroidNativeLibrary {0} - The library name.

trans-unit.source: Invalid value for `$(AndroidSequencePointsMode)`: {0}
trans-unit.target: Nieprawidłowa wartość parametru „$(AndroidSequencePointsMode)”: {0}
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `$(AndroidSequencePointsMode)`

trans-unit.source: The $(TargetFrameworkVersion) for {0} ({1}) is greater than the $(TargetFrameworkVersion) for the application project ({2}). Please increase the $(TargetFrameworkVersion) for the application project.
trans-unit.target: Parametr $(TargetFrameworkVersion) dla elementu {0} ({1}) jest większy niż parametr $(TargetFrameworkVersion) dla projektu aplikacji ({2}). Zwiększ wartość parametru $(TargetFrameworkVersion) dla projektu aplikacji.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: $(TargetFrameworkVersion) {0} - The file name of the library referenced by the application {1} - The target framework version number for the library {2} - The target framework version number for the application project

trans-unit.source: {0} is a Reference Assembly.
trans-unit.target: {0} to zestaw odwołania.

trans-unit.source: Ignoring Reference Assembly `{0}`.
trans-unit.target: Ignorowanie zestawu odwołania „{0}”.
trans-unit.note: {0} - File name of the assembly.

trans-unit.source: Could not get version from '{0}'. Defaulting to 1.0
trans-unit.target: Nie można pobrać wersji z elementu „{0}”. Zostanie użyta wartość domyślna 1.0.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The tool name

trans-unit.source: Could not get the `aapt2` version. Disabling `aapt2` support. Please check it is installed correctly.
trans-unit.target: Nie można uzyskać wersji „aapt2”. Obsługa wersji „aapt2” została wyłączona. Sprawdź, czy jest ona poprawnie zainstalowana.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `aapt2`

trans-unit.source: `aapt2` is not installed. Disabling `aapt2` support. Please check it is installed correctly.
trans-unit.target: Wersja „aapt2” nie jest zainstalowana. Obsługa wersji „aapt2” została wyłączona. Sprawdź, czy jest ona poprawnie zainstalowana.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `aapt2`

trans-unit.source: Google Play requires that new applications and updates must use a TargetFrameworkVersion of v9.0 (API level 28) or above. You are currently targeting {0} (API level {1}).
trans-unit.target: Sklep Google Play wymaga, aby nowe aplikacje i aktualizacje używały elementu TargetFrameworkVersion o wartości v8.0 (poziom 26 lub nowszy interfejsu API). Obecna wersja docelowa to {0} (poziom interfejsu API {1}).
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: TargetFrameworkVersion, v9.0 {0} - The current value of TargetFrameworkVersion {1} - The corresponding API level number

trans-unit.source: Unable to find `EmbeddedResource` named `{0}`.
trans-unit.target: Nie można odnaleźć elementu „EmbeddedResource” o nazwie „{0}”.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: EmbeddedResource {0} - The name of the missing resource

trans-unit.source: The TargetFrameworkVersion {0} is deprecated. Please update it to be v5.0 or higher.
trans-unit.target: Wartość {0} dla elementu TargetFrameworkVersion jest przestarzała. Zaktualizuj ją na wartość v4.4 lub wyższą.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: TargetFrameworkVersion, v5.0 {0} - The current value of TargetFrameworkVersion

trans-unit.source: Could not parse '{0}'
trans-unit.target: Nie można przeanalizować elementu „{0}”
trans-unit.note: {0} - A NuGet target framework moniker string

trans-unit.source: Could not resolve `target` in lock file for '{0}'
trans-unit.target: Nie można rozpoznać elementu „target” w pliku blokady dla elementu „{0}”
trans-unit.note:
The following are literal names and should not be translated: `target`
The term "lock file" comes from NuGet. For example, search for "UnauthorizedLockFail" in https://github.com/NuGet/NuGet.Build.Localization to see some example localizations of "lock file."
{0} - A NuGet target framework moniker string

trans-unit.source: Assembly '{0}' is using '[assembly: {1}]', which is no longer supported. Use a newer version of this NuGet package or notify the library author.
trans-unit.target: Zestaw „{0}” korzysta z atrybutu „[assembly: {1}]”, który nie jest już obsługiwany. Użyj nowszej wersji tego pakietu NuGet lub powiadom autora biblioteki.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: [assembly: {1}], NuGet {0} - The assembly name {1} - The unsupported attribute

trans-unit.source: Assembly '{0}' is using a deprecated attribute '[assembly: {1}]'. Use a newer version of this NuGet package or notify the library author.
trans-unit.target: Zestaw „{0}” korzysta z przestarzałego atrybutu „[assembly: {1}]”. Użyj nowszej wersji tego pakietu NuGet lub powiadom autora biblioteki.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: [assembly: {1}], NuGet

trans-unit.source: Removing {0} from {1}. Lint {2} does not support this check.
trans-unit.target: Removing {0} from {1}. Lint {2} does not support this check.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Lint When it appears in the middle of a sentence, "lint" is not capitalized. {0} - The literal name of a lint check, such as HardcodedDebugMode {1} - The literal name of the MSBuild property {2} - The lint version number

trans-unit.source: Interpreter is not supported by the x86 ABI
trans-unit.target: Interpreter is not supported by the x86 ABI

trans-unit.source: There was a problem parsing {0}. This is likely due to incomplete or invalid XML. Exception: {1}
trans-unit.target: Wystąpił problem podczas analizowania pliku {0}. Prawdopodobnie jest to spowodowane niekompletnym lub nieprawidłowym kodem XML. Wyjątek: {1}
trans-unit.note: {0} - The file name {1} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: AndroidResgen: Warning while updating resource XML '{0}': {1}
trans-unit.target: AndroidResgen: ostrzeżenie podczas aktualizacji kodu XML zasobu „{0}”: {1}
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: AndroidResgen {0} - The name of the XML file {1} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: The closest match found for '{0}' is '{1}', but the capitalization does not match. Please correct the capitalization.
trans-unit.target: Najbliższy znaleziony odpowiednik dla typu „{0}” to „{1}”, ale nie zgadza się wielkość liter. Popraw wielkość liter.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The user-provided type name {1} - The type name found

trans-unit.source: Attempting basic type name matching for element with ID '{0}' and type '{1}'
trans-unit.target: Podjęto próbę dopasowania nazwy typu podstawowego dla elementu o identyfikatorze „{0}” i typie „{1}”
trans-unit.note: {0} - The Android resource ID name

trans-unit.source: If basic type name matching fails, please add a `xamarin:managedType` attribute to the element to specify the fully qualified managed type name of the element.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli dopasowanie nazwy typu podstawowego nie powiedzie się, dodaj atrybut „xamarin:managedType” do elementu, aby określić w pełni kwalifikowaną nazwę typu zarządzanego elementu.
trans-unit.note: "xamarin:managedType" is a literal name and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: The TargetFrameworkVersion (Android API level {0}) is higher than the targetSdkVersion ({1}). Please increase the `android:targetSdkVersion` in the `AndroidManifest.xml` so that the API levels match.
trans-unit.target: Wartość atrybutu TargetFrameworkVersion (poziom interfejsu API systemu Android {0}) jest większa niż wartość atrybutu targetSdkVersion ({1}). Zwiększ wartość atrybutu „android:targetSdkVersion” w pliku „AndroidManifest.xml”, aby poziomy interfejsów API były zgodne.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: targetSdkVersion, TargetFrameworkVersion, android:targetSdkVersion, AndroidManifest.xml {0} - The target framework version number {1} - The target SDK version number

trans-unit.source: The minSdkVersion ({0}) is greater than the targetSdkVersion. Please change the value such that the minSdkVersion is less than or equal to the targetSdkVersion ({1}).
trans-unit.target: Wartość atrybutu minSdkVersion ({0}) jest większa niż wartość atrybutu minSdkVersion. Zmień wartość atrybutu minSdkVersion w taki sposób, aby była mniejsza lub równa wartości atrybutu targetSdkVersion ({1}).
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: minSdkVersion, targetSdkVersion {0} - The minimum SDK version number {1} - The target SDK version number

trans-unit.source: The TargetFrameworkVersion (Android API level {0}) is lower than the targetSdkVersion ({1}). Please increase the `$(TargetFrameworkVersion)` or decrease the `android:targetSdkVersion` in the `AndroidManifest.xml` so that the API levels match.
trans-unit.target: Wartość atrybutu TargetFrameworkVersion (poziom interfejsu API systemu Android {0}) jest mniejsza niż wartość atrybutu targetSdkVersion ({1}). Zwiększ wartość atrybutu „$(TargetFrameworkVersion)” lub zmniejsz wartość atrybutu „android:targetSdkVersion” w pliku „AndroidManifest.xml”, aby poziomy interfejsów API były zgodne.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: targetSdkVersion, TargetFrameworkVersion, android:targetSdkVersion, AndroidManifest.xml {0} - The target framework version number {1} - The target SDK version number

trans-unit.source: Invalid `$(AndroidManifestPlaceholders)` value for Android manifest placeholders. Please use `key1=value1;key2=value2` format. The specified value was: `{0}`
trans-unit.target: Nieprawidłowa wartość „$(AndroidManifestPlaceholders)” dla symboli zastępczych manifestu systemu Android. Użyj formatu „klucz1=wartość1; klucz2=wartość2”. Podana wartość: „{0}”
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `$(AndroidManifestPlaceholders)`

trans-unit.source: Using ProGuard with the D8 DEX compiler is no longer supported. Please update `$(AndroidLinkTool)` to `r8`.
trans-unit.target: Używanie narzędzie ProGuard z kompilatorem D8 DEX nie jest już obsługiwane. Zaktualizuj narzędzie „$(AndroidLinkTool)” do wersji „R8”.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: ProGuard, D8, DEX, `$(AndroidLinkTool)`, `r8`

trans-unit.source: Included layout root element override ID '{0}' is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Dołączony identyfikator przesłonięcia „{0}” elementu głównego układu jest nieprawidłowy.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The Android resource ID name

trans-unit.source: Failed to parse ID of node '{0}' in the layout file '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: Nie można przeanalizować identyfikatora węzła „{0}” w pliku układu „{1}”.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The Android resource XML element name {1} - The path of the layout file

trans-unit.source: JAR library references with identical file names but different contents were found: {0}. Please remove any conflicting libraries from EmbeddedJar, InputJar and AndroidJavaLibrary.
trans-unit.target: Znaleziono odwołania do bibliotek JAR z identycznymi nazwami plików, ale różną zawartością: {0}. Usuń wszystkie biblioteki powodujące konflikt z elementów EmbeddedJar, InputJar i AndroidJavaLibrary.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: JAR, EmbeddedJar, InputJar and AndroidJavaLibrary {0} - Comma-separated list of the conflicting JAR library file names

trans-unit.source: More than one Android Wear project is specified as the paired project. It can be at most one.
trans-unit.target: Jako projekt sparowany określono więcej niż jeden projekt systemu Android Wear. Może być najwyżej jeden taki projekt.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Android Wear

trans-unit.source: Target Wear application's project '{0}' does not specify required 'AndroidManifest' project property.
trans-unit.target: Projekt aplikacji docelowej systemu Wear „{0}” nie określa wymaganej właściwości projektu „AndroidManifest”.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Wear, AndroidManifest "Wear" is a short version of the full product name "Wear OS" and so should not be translated. {0} - The project file name

trans-unit.source: Target Wear application's AndroidManifest.xml does not specify required 'package' attribute.
trans-unit.target: Plik AndroidManifest.xml aplikacji docelowej systemu Wear nie określa wymaganego atrybutu „package”.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Wear, AndroidManifest.xml, 'package' "Wear" is a short version of the full product name "Wear OS" and so should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Specified AndroidManifest file does not exist: {0}.
trans-unit.target: Określony plik AndroidManifest nie istnieje: {0}.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: AndroidManifest {0} - The path of the specified AndroidManifest file

trans-unit.source: `LibraryProjectProperties` file `{0}` is located in a parent directory of the bindings project's intermediate output directory. Please adjust the path to use the original `project.properties` file directly from the Android library project directory.
trans-unit.target: `LibraryProjectProperties` file `{0}` is located in a parent directory of the bindings project's intermediate output directory. Please adjust the path to use the original `project.properties` file directly from the Android library project directory.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: LibraryProjectProperties, project.properties, Android In this message, the term "binding" means a piece of generated code that makes it easy to access an Android API written in Java from a Xamarin.Android project written in C# or F#. {0} - The path of the LibraryProjectProperties file

trans-unit.source: At least one Java library is required for binding. Check that a Java library is included in the project and has the appropriate build action: 'LibraryProjectZip' (for AAR or ZIP), 'EmbeddedJar', 'InputJar' (for JAR), or 'LibraryProjectProperties' (project.properties).
trans-unit.target: At least one Java library is required for binding. Check that a Java library is included in the project and has the appropriate build action: 'LibraryProjectZip' (for AAR or ZIP), 'EmbeddedJar', 'InputJar' (for JAR), or 'LibraryProjectProperties' (project.properties).
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: LibraryProjectZip, EmbeddedJar, InputJar, LibraryProjectProperties, project.properties

trans-unit.source: Specified source Java library not found: {0}
trans-unit.target: Specified source Java library not found: {0}
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "source Java library" refers to the library that will be processed. In this case, the term "source" does not refer to "source code." {0} - The file name of the library

trans-unit.source: Specified reference Java library not found: {0}
trans-unit.target: Specified reference Java library not found: {0}
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "reference Java library" refers to a library that is included as a reference so that types from the library can be resolved during the build process. {0} - The file name of the library

trans-unit.source: Use of AppDomain.CreateDomain() detected in assembly: {0}. .NET 5 will only support a single AppDomain, so this API will no longer be available in Xamarin.Android once .NET 5 is released.
trans-unit.target: Wykryto użycie metody AppDomain.CreateDomain() w następującym zestawie: {0}. Program .NET 5 obsługuje tylko jeden obiekt AppDomain, dlatego ten interfejs API nie będzie już dostępny w interfejsie Xamarin.Android po wydaniu programu .NET 5.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: AppDomain.CreateDomain(), AppDomain {0} - The name of the assembly

trans-unit.source: Source file '{0}' could not be found.
trans-unit.target: Nie można znaleźć pliku źródłowego „{0}”.

trans-unit.source: Can not resolve reference: `{0}`, referenced by {1}. Perhaps it doesn't exist in the Mono for Android profile?
trans-unit.target: Nie można rozpoznać odwołania „{0}” przywoływanego przez element {1}. Być może nie istnieje ono w profilu platformy Mono dla systemu Android?
trans-unit.note: {0} - The name of the missing assembly {1} - The chain of references that causes a reference to the missing assembly, with > as the separator between items. Example: `System.Memory` > `System.Buffers`

trans-unit.source: Can not resolve reference: `{0}`, referenced by {1}. Please add a NuGet package or assembly reference for `{0}`, or remove the reference to `{2}`.
trans-unit.target: Nie można rozpoznać odwołania „{0}” przywoływanego przez element {1}. Dodaj odwołanie do pakietu lub zestawu NuGet dla elementu „{0}” lub usuń odwołanie do elementu „{2}”.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The name of the missing assembly {1} - The chain of references that causes a reference to the missing assembly, with > as the separator between items. Example: `System.Memory` > `System.Buffers` {2} - The name of the first assembly in the chain of references. Example: System.Memory

trans-unit.source: Could not resolve reference to '{0}' (defined in assembly '{1}') with scope '{2}'. When the scope is different from the defining assembly, it usually means that the type is forwarded.
trans-unit.target: Nie można rozpoznać odwołania do elementu „{0}” (zdefiniowanego w zestawie „{1}”) z zakresem „{2}”. Jeśli zakres różni się od zestawu definiującego, zazwyczaj oznacza to, że typ jest przekazywany.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The member name, such as a class name {1} - The assembly name {2} - The scope of the member, such as the name of a different assembly

trans-unit.source: Exception while loading assemblies: {0}
trans-unit.target: Wyjątek podczas ładowania zestawów: {0}
trans-unit.note: {0} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: In referenced assembly {0}, Java.Interop.DoNotPackageAttribute requires non-null file name.
trans-unit.target: W przywoływanym zestawie {0} element Java.Interop.DoNotPackageAttribute wymaga nazwy pliku o wartości innej niż null.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Java.Interop.DoNotPackageAttribute {0} - The assembly name

trans-unit.source: Could not AOT the assembly: {0}
trans-unit.target: Nie można utworzyć widoku AOT zestawu: {0}
trans-unit.note: The abbreviation "AOT" should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Invalid AOT mode: {0}
trans-unit.target: Nieprawidłowy tryb AOT: {0}
trans-unit.note: The abbreviation "AOT" should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Could not strip IL of assembly: {0}
trans-unit.target: Nie można usunąć kodu IL zestawu: {0}
trans-unit.note: The abbreviation "IL" should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Android NDK r10d is buggy and provides an incompatible x86_64 libm.so. See https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=161422.
trans-unit.target: Zestaw Android NDK r10d zawiera wiele usterek i dostarcza niezgodną bibliotekę libm.so dla architektury x86_64. Zobacz https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=161422.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: NDK, r10d, x86_64, libm.so "r10d" is the problematic version of the NDK. "x86_64" is the architecture of the libm.so file.

trans-unit.source: The detected Android NDK version is incompatible with the targeted LLVM configuration. Please upgrade to NDK r10d or newer.
trans-unit.target: Wykryta wersja zestawu Android NDK jest niezgodna z docelową konfiguracją programu LLVM. Uaktualnij do zestawu NDK r10d lub nowszego.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: NDK, LLVM, r10d "r10d" is the version of the NDK.

trans-unit.source: Could not compile native assembly file: {0}
trans-unit.target: Nie można skompilować natywnego pliku zestawu: {0}
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "assembly" means the low-level language that an assembler like `as` takes as input. (This is different from most of the other messages, where the term "assembly" means the file type that the C# compiler produces.)

trans-unit.source: Could not link native shared library: {0}
trans-unit.target: Nie można połączyć natywnej biblioteki współużytkowanej: {0}

trans-unit.source: Failed to generate Java type for class: {0} due to {1}
trans-unit.target: Nie można wygenerować typu języka Java dla klasy {0} z powodu wyjątku {1}
trans-unit.note: {0} - The managed type name {1} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: Please add a reference to Mono.Android.Export.dll when using ExportAttribute or ExportFieldAttribute.
trans-unit.target: Dodaj odwołanie do pliku Mono.Android.Export.dll w przypadku używania atrybutu ExportAttribute lub ExportFieldAttribute.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Mono.Android.Export.dll, ExportAttribute, ExportFieldAttribute.

trans-unit.source: AndroidManifest.xml //uses-sdk/@android:targetSdkVersion '{0}' is less than $(TargetFrameworkVersion) '{1}'. Using API-{2} for ACW compilation.
trans-unit.target: Wersja //uses-sdk/@android:targetSdkVersion w pliku AndroidManifest.xml „{0}” jest niższa niż $(TargetFrameworkVersion) „{1}”. Używanie wersji API-{2} na potrzeby kompilacji ACW.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: AndroidManifest.xml, //uses-sdk/@android:targetSdkVersion , $(TargetFrameworkVersion), API-{2}, ACW {0} - The target SDK version number {1} - The target framework version number {2} - The API version number

trans-unit.source: The type '{0}' must provide a public default constructor
trans-unit.target: Typ „{0}” musi dostarczać publiczny konstruktor domyślny

trans-unit.source: The managed type `{0}` exists in multiple assemblies: {1}. Please refactor the managed type names in these assemblies so that they are not identical.
trans-unit.target: Typ zarządzany „{0}” istnieje w wielu zestawach: {1}. Wykonaj refaktoryzację nazw typów zarządzanych w tych zestawach, aby nie były identyczne.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The managed type name {1} - Comma-separated list of all the assemblies where the managed type exists

trans-unit.source: References to the type `{0}` will refer to `{0}, {1}`.
trans-unit.target: Odwołania do typu „{0}” będą odwoływać się do typu „{0}, {1}”.
trans-unit.note: The phrase "`{0}, {1}`" does not need to be translated. {0} - The managed type name {1} - The name of the library that contains the type

trans-unit.source: The Java type `{0}` is generated by more than one managed type. Please change the [Register] attribute so that the same Java type is not emitted.
trans-unit.target: Typ języka Java „{0}” jest generowany przez więcej niż jeden typ zarządzany. Zmień atrybut [Register], aby ten sam typ języka Java nie był emitowany.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Java, [Register]

trans-unit.source: `{0}` generated by: {1}
trans-unit.target: Element „{0}” wygenerowany przez zarządzany element „{1}”
trans-unit.note: The two spaces indentation at the beginning of this message should be preserved in the translations where possible. {0} - The generated Java type name {1} - The managed type name

trans-unit.source: AndroidManifest.xml //uses-sdk/@android:minSdkVersion '{0}' is less than API-{1}, this configuration is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Wersja //uses-sdk/@android:minSdkVersion w pliku AndroidManifest.xml „{0}” jest niższa niż API-{1}. Taka konfiguracja nie jest obsługiwana.

trans-unit.source: AndroidManifest.xml //uses-sdk/@android:targetSdkVersion '{0}' is less than API-{1}, this configuration is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Wersja //uses-sdk/@android:targetSdkVersion w pliku AndroidManifest.xml „{0}” jest niższa niż API-{1}. Taka konfiguracja nie jest obsługiwana.

trans-unit.source: Unable to find //manifest/application/uses-library at path: {0}
trans-unit.target: Nie można znaleźć elementu //manifest/application/uses-library w ścieżce: {0}
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: //manifest/application/uses-library

trans-unit.source: Cannot find binding generator for language {0} or {1}.
trans-unit.target: Nie można odnaleźć generatora powiązań dla języka {0} ani {1}.
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "binding" means a piece of code that makes it easy to access a certain kind of data that is originally stored outside of the target programming language, which is usually C#. {0} - The target programming language name, which is usually C# {1} - The default programming language name, which is also usually C#

trans-unit.source: Partial class item '{0}' does not have an associated binding for layout '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: Element klasy częściowej „{0}” nie ma skojarzonego powiązania dla układu „{1}”.
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "partial class item" means a .NET partial class. In this message, the term "binding" means a piece of code that makes it easy to access a certain kind of data that is originally stored outside of the target programming language, which is usually C#. In this mesage, the term "layout" means an Android UI layout. {1} - The path of the partial class file {0} - The name of the layout

trans-unit.source: No layout binding source files were generated.
trans-unit.target: Nie wygenerowano żadnych plików źródłowych powiązania układu.
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "binding" means a piece of code that makes it easy to access a certain kind of data that is originally stored outside of the target programming language, which is usually C#. In this mesage, the term "layout" means an Android UI layout. In this message, the term "source files" means files that can be compiled, usually containing C# source code.

trans-unit.source: No widgets found for layout ({0}).
trans-unit.target: Nie odnaleziono żadnych widżetów dla układu ({0}).
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "widgets" means Android UI elements. In this mesage, the term "layout" means an Android UI layout. {0} - Semicolon-separated list of paths for the files that define the layout

trans-unit.source: Malformed full class name '{0}'. Missing namespace.
trans-unit.target: Źle sformułowana pełna nazwa klasy „{0}”. Brak przestrzeni nazw.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The class name

trans-unit.source: Malformed full class name '{0}'. Missing class name.
trans-unit.target: Źle sformułowana pełna nazwa klasy „{0}”. Brak nazwy klasy.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The class name

trans-unit.source: Widget '{0}' in layout '{1}' has multiple instances with different types. The property type will be set to: {2}
trans-unit.target: Widżet „{0}” w układzie „{1}” ma wiele wystąpień o różnych typach. Typ właściwości zostanie skonfigurowany na następującą wartość: {2}
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "widgets" means Android UI elements. In this mesage, the term "layout" means an Android UI layout. {0} - The name of the widget {1} - The name of the layout {2} - The type name that will be used, such as "object"

trans-unit.source: Resource item '{0}' does not have the required metadata item '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: Element zasobu „{0}” nie ma wymaganego elementu metadanych „{1}”.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The name of the Android layout resource file {1} - The name of the metadata item

trans-unit.source: Unable to find specified //activity-alias/@android:targetActivity: '{0}'
trans-unit.target: Nie można znaleźć określonego elementu //activity-alias/@android:targetActivity: „{0}”
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: //activity-alias/@android:targetActivity {0} - The specified targetActivity name

trans-unit.source: Unrecognized `TransformFile` root element: {0}.
trans-unit.target: Unrecognized `TransformFile` root element: {0}.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: TransformFile In this message, "root element" refers to the root element of an XML file. {0} - The name of the root element

trans-unit.source: Error parsing XML: {0}
trans-unit.target: Error parsing XML: {0}
trans-unit.note: {0} - The exception message and stack trace of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: The Android class parser value '{0}' is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of Xamarin.Android. Update the project properties to use 'class-parse'.
trans-unit.target: The Android class parser value '{0}' is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of Xamarin.Android. Update the project properties to use 'class-parse'.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: class-parse {0} - The name of the current class parser value

trans-unit.source: The Android code generation target '{0}' is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of Xamarin.Android. Update the project properties to use 'XAJavaInterop1'.
trans-unit.target: The Android code generation target '{0}' is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of Xamarin.Android. Update the project properties to use 'XAJavaInterop1'.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: XAJavaInterop1 {0} - The name of the current code generation target

trans-unit.source: Native library '{0}' will not be bundled because it has an unsupported ABI.
trans-unit.target: Biblioteka natywna „{0}” nie zostanie umieszczona w pakiecie, ponieważ zawiera nieobsługiwany zestaw ABI.
trans-unit.note: The abbreviation "ABI" should not be translated. In this message, the term "bundled" is a short way of saying "included into the final application package."

trans-unit.source: APK already contains the item {0}; ignoring.
trans-unit.target: Zestaw APK zawiera już element {0}; jest ignorowany.
trans-unit.note: The abbreviation "APK" should not be translated. {0} - The file name.

trans-unit.source: Cannot determine ABI of native library {0}.
trans-unit.target: Nie można określić interfejsu ABI natywnej biblioteki {0}.
trans-unit.note: The abbreviation "ABI" should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Could not determine ABI of some native libraries. Ignoring those: {0}
trans-unit.target: Nie można było określić interfejsu ABI niektórych bibliotek natywnych. Następujące są ignorowane: {0}
trans-unit.note: The abbreviation "ABI" should not be translated. {0} - Comma-separated list of the ignored library file names.

trans-unit.source: Unhandled exception merging `AndroidManifest.xml`: {0}
trans-unit.target: Nieobsługiwany wyjątek podczas scalania pliku „AndroidManifest.xml”: {0}
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `AndroidManifest.xml` {0} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: Error extracting resources from "{0}": {1}
trans-unit.target: Błąd podczas wyodrębniania zasobów z pliku „{0}”: {1}
trans-unit.note: {0} - The file name {1} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: ProGuard configuration file '{0}' was not found.
trans-unit.target: Nie znaleziono pliku konfiguracji programu ProGuard „{0}”.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: ProGuard

trans-unit.source: Multidex is enabled, but `$(_AndroidMainDexListFile)` is empty.
trans-unit.target: Biblioteka Multidex jest włączona, ale plik „$(_AndroidMainDexListFile)” jest pusty.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Multidex, $(_AndroidMainDexListFile)

trans-unit.source: Multidex is enabled, but the `$(_AndroidMainDexListFile)` file '{0}' does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Biblioteka Multidex jest włączona, ale plik „$(_AndroidMainDexListFile)” „{0}” nie istnieje.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Multidex, $(_AndroidMainDexListFile)

trans-unit.source: R8 does not support `@(MultiDexMainDexList)` files when android:minSdkVersion >= 21
trans-unit.target: Element R8 nie obsługuje plików „@(MultiDexMainDexList)”, jeśli wartość właściwości android:minSdkVersion jest większa lub równa 21
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: R8, @(MultiDexMainDexList), android:minSdkVersion

trans-unit.source: Invalid ProGuard configuration file. {0}
trans-unit.target: Nieprawidłowy plik konfiguracji programu ProGuard. {0}
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: ProGuard {0} - The error message returned by the ProGuard tool.

trans-unit.source: Failed to generate type maps
trans-unit.target: Nie można wygenerować map typów

trans-unit.source: 'MultiDexMainDexList' file '{0}' does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Plik „MultiDexMainDexList” „{0}” nie istnieje.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: MultiDexMainDexList

trans-unit.source: `$(AndroidSigningKeyStore)` file `{0}` could not be found.
trans-unit.target: Nie można odnaleźć pliku „$(AndroidSigningKeyStore)” („{0}”).
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: `$(AndroidSigningKeyStore)`

trans-unit.source: The application won't contain the paired Wear package because the Wear application package APK is not created yet. If building on the command line, be sure to build the "SignAndroidPackage" target.
trans-unit.target: Aplikacja nie będzie zawierać sparowanego pakietu systemu Wear, ponieważ plik APK pakietu aplikacji systemu Wear nie został jeszcze utworzony. W przypadku kompilowania z poziomu wiersza polecenia pamiętaj, aby skompilować element docelowy „SignAndroidPackage”.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Wear, APK, SignAndroidPackage "Wear" is a short version of the full product name "Wear OS" and so should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Missing Android NDK toolchains directory '{0}'. Please install the Android NDK.
trans-unit.target: Brak katalogu łańcuchów narzędzi zestawu Android NDK „{0}”. Zainstaluj zestaw Android NDK.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The path of the missing directory

trans-unit.source: C compiler for target {0} was not found. Tried paths: "{1}"
trans-unit.target: Nie znaleziono kompilatora języka C dla docelowej architektury {0}. Sprawdzone ścieżki: „{1}”
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: C {0} - The target architecture, such as Arm, Arm64, or X86_64 {1} - Semicolon-separated list of the paths searched

trans-unit.source: Toolchain directory for target {0} was not found.
trans-unit.target: Nie znaleziono katalogu łańcucha narzędzi dla docelowej architektury {0}.
trans-unit.note: {0} - The target architecture, such as Arm, Arm64, or X86_64

trans-unit.source: Conversion from assembly to native code failed. Exit code {0}
trans-unit.target: Konwersja z zestawu do kodu natywnego nie powiodła się. Kod zakończenia {0}
trans-unit.note: In this message, the term "assembly" means the low-level language that an assembler like `as` takes as input. (This is different from most of the other messages, where the term "assembly" means the file type that the C# compiler produces.) {0} - The exit code number

trans-unit.source: NDK C compiler exited with an error. Exit code {0}
trans-unit.target: Kompilator języka C zestawu NDK zakończył pracę z błędem. Kod zakończenia {0}
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: NDK, C {0} - The exit code number

trans-unit.source: Could not locate the Android NDK. Please make sure the Android NDK is installed in the Android SDK Manager, or if using a custom NDK path, please ensure the $(AndroidNdkDirectory) MSBuild property is set to the custom path.
trans-unit.target: Nie można było zlokalizować zestawu Android NDK. Upewnij się, że zestaw Android NDK jest zainstalowany w Menedżerze zestawów Android SDK, a jeśli używana jest niestandardowa ścieżka zestawu NDK, upewnij się, że właściwość $(AndroidNdkDirectory) narzędzia MSBuild jest ustawiona na ścieżkę niestandardową.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: $(AndroidNdkDirectory)

trans-unit.source: Toolchain utility '{0}' for target {1} was not found. Tried in path: "{2}"
trans-unit.target: Nie znaleziono programu łańcucha narzędzi „{0}” dla docelowej architektury {1}. Sprawdzone ścieżki: „{2}”
trans-unit.note: {0} - The missing utility name, such as gcc or clang {1} - The target architecture, such as Arm, Arm64, or X86_64 {2} - The path of the directory that was searched

trans-unit.source: NDK linker exited with an error. Exit code {0}
trans-unit.target: Konsolidator zestawu NDK zakończył pracę z błędem. Kod zakończenia {0}
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: NDK {0} - The exit code number

trans-unit.source: Cannot find `{0}`. Please install the Android SDK Build-Tools package with the `{1}{2}tools{2}{3}` program.
trans-unit.target: Nie można znaleźć narzędzia „{0}”. Zainstaluj pakiet Android SDK Build-Tools za pomocą programu „{1}{2}tools{2}{3}”.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Android SDK Build-Tools, {1}{2}tools{2}{3} {0} - The missing tool name {1} - The parent directory {2} - The directory separator character {3} - The installer program name

trans-unit.source: Cannot find `{0}` in the Android SDK. Please set its path via /p:LintToolPath.
trans-unit.target: W zestawie Android SDK nie można znaleźć narzędzia „{0}”. Określ jego ścieżkę za pomocą opcji /p:LintToolPath.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: /p:LintToolPath {0} - The missing tool name

trans-unit.source: Could not find android.jar for API level {0}. This means the Android SDK platform for API level {0} is not installed. Either install it in the Android SDK Manager ({2}), or change the Xamarin.Android project to target an API version that is installed. ({1} missing.)
trans-unit.target: Nie można było znaleźć pliku android.jar dla poziomu interfejsu API {0}. Oznacza to, że platforma Android SDK dla poziomu interfejsu API {0} nie jest zainstalowana. Zainstaluj ją w Menedżerze zestawów Android SDK ({2}) lub zmień projekt Xamarin.Android tak, aby był przeznaczony dla zainstalowanej wersji interfejsu API. (Brak pliku {1}).
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: android.jar {0} - The API level name {1} - The expected path of the android.jar file {2} - The menu location in Visual Studio that can be used to launch the Android SDK Manager

trans-unit.source: Tools > Android > Android SDK Manager...
trans-unit.target: Narzędzia > Android > Menedżer zestawów Android SDK...
trans-unit.note: This string is the location of a menu command in Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Tools > Open Android SDK Manager...
trans-unit.target: Narzędzia > Otwórz Menedżer zestawów SDK dla systemu Android...
trans-unit.note: This string is the location of a menu command in Visual Studio for Mac.

trans-unit.source: Embedded Wear app package name differs from handheld app package name ({0} != {1}).
trans-unit.target: Nazwa pakietu osadzonej aplikacji systemu Wear jest inna niż nazwa pakietu aplikacji dla urządzenia podręcznego ({0} != {1}).
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: Wear "Wear" is a short version of the full product name "Wear OS" and so should not be translated. In this message, the term "handheld app" means "app for handheld devices." {0} - The Wear app package name {1} - The handheld app package name

trans-unit.source: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError. Consider increasing the value of $(JavaMaximumHeapSize). Java ran out of memory while executing '{0} {1}'
trans-unit.target: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError. Rozważ zwiększenie wartości parametru $(JavaMaximumHeapSize). Zabrakło pamięci dla środowiska Java podczas wykonywania elementu „{0} {1}”.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError, $(JavaMaximumHeapSize) {0} - The tool name {1} - The command line arguments used for the tool

trans-unit.source: No Android platforms installed at '{0}'. Please install an SDK Platform with the `{1}{2}tools{2}{3}` program.
trans-unit.target: Brak platform systemu Android zainstalowanych w: „{0}”. Zainstaluj platformę zestawu SDK za pomocą programu „{1}{2}tools{2}{3}”.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: SDK Platform, {1}{2}tools{2}{3} {0} - The missing tool name {1} - The parent directory {2} - The directory separator character {3} - The installer program name

trans-unit.source: The Android SDK directory could not be found. Please set via /p:AndroidSdkDirectory.
trans-unit.target: Nie udało się znaleźć katalogu zestawu Android SDK. Określ go za pomocą opcji /p:AndroidSdkDirectory.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: /p:AndroidSdkDirectory

trans-unit.source: The Java SDK directory could not be found. Please set via /p:JavaSdkDirectory.
trans-unit.target: Nie udało się znaleźć katalogu zestawu Java SDK. Określ go za pomocą opcji /p:JavaSdkDirectory.
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: /p:JavaSdkDirectory

trans-unit.source: Failed to generate Java type for class: {0} due to MAX_PATH: {1}
trans-unit.target: Nie można wygenerować typu języka Java dla klasy {0} z powodu elementu MAX_PATH: {1}
trans-unit.note: The following are literal names and should not be translated: MAX_PATH. {0} - The managed type name {1} - The exception message of the associated exception

trans-unit.source: Two processes may be building this project at once. Lock file exists at path: {0}
trans-unit.target: Ten projekt może być kompilowany jednocześnie przez dwa procesy. Plik blokady istnieje w ścieżce: {0}
